UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Morphing of Amphipathic Helices to Explore the Activity and Selectivity of Membranolytic Antimicrobial Peptides.
Literature.Author: Müller AT, Posselt G, Gabernet G, Neuhaus C, Bachler S, Blatter M, Pfeiffer B, Hiss JA, Dittrich PS, Altmann K-H, Wessler S, Schneider G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=>250 µM,Human dermal microvascular endothelial cells HDME:50% Cell death=533 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus SH1000(MIC=33µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>22µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>22µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>22µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>22µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>22µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>22µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 208821(MIC=>22µM)
